docs.snippet: A four-time world player of the year, Argentina's Lionel Messi is gifted with talents that most footballers can only dream of. What makes him special is that he possesses not just one or two but a combination of special skills that give him an edg...
docs.lead_paragraph: A four-time world player of the year, Argentina's Lionel Messi is gifted with talents that most footballers can only dream of. What makes him special is that he possesses not just one or two but a combination of special skills that give him an edge over just about everyone.

headline.main: 5 Reasons Why Messi Stands Out in Football World
headline.print_headline: 5 Reasons Why Messi Stands Out in Football World

docs.snippet: Marcelo looked wide-eyed, stunned when he scored the first goal of the World Cup ... against his own team. Hardly the most auspicious of starts for Brazil. But that blooper just 11 minutes into the tournament was soon forgiven and forgotten as Bra...
docs.lead_paragraph: Marcelo looked wide-eyed, stunned when he scored the first goal of the World Cup ... against his own team. Hardly the most auspicious of starts for Brazil. But that blooper just 11 minutes into the tournament was soon forgiven and forgotten as Brazil went on to win that opening game and the 2014 World Cup quickly flowered into a roaring success, confounding doom and gloom merchants who predicted Brazil couldn't pull it off without major protests and problems.

headline.main: 5 High- and Lowlights of Most Memorable World Cup
headline.print_headline: 5 High- and Lowlights of Most Memorable World Cup

docs.snippet: New guidelines issued by the National Collegiate Athletic Association provide no mechanism for oversight or enforcement....
docs.lead_paragraph: New guidelines issued by the National Collegiate Athletic Association provide no mechanism for oversight or enforcement.
docs.abstract: Editorial warns that voluntary guidelines for concussion safety released by National Collegiate Athletic Association may prove inadequate for reducing such injuries; holds that part of problem is that guidelines provide no mechanism for oversight or enforcement; suggests that organization should make guidelines mandatory in future.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Guidelines on Head Injuries Fall Short

docs.snippet: A selection of the best quotes from the 2014 World Cup in Brazil....
docs.lead_paragraph: A selection of the best quotes from the 2014 World Cup in Brazil.

docs.snippet: Brazil came into the World Cup expecting nothing less than victory but tactical naivety, a lack of emotional preparation and an inability to overcome the loss of two leading players cost them the chance of winning a sixth title....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil came into the World Cup expecting nothing less than victory but tactical naivety, a lack of emotional preparation and an inability to overcome the loss of two leading players cost them the chance of winning a sixth title.

headline.main: Brazil Pay Heavy Price for Tactical Naivety, Immaturity
headline.print_headline: Brazil Pay Heavy Price for Tactical Naivety, Immaturity
